debates.showAs: Planning and Development (Stationary Battery Energy Storage Systems) Bill 2024: Restoration to Order Paper
Planning and Development (Stationary Battery Energy Storage Systems) Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend and extend the Planning and Development Regulations 2001 to include in the classes of development requiring an environmental impact assessment report certain installations of stationary battery energy storage systems, and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú agus do leathnú na Rialachán um Pleanáil agus Forbairt, 2001 chun go ndéanfar suiteálacha áirithe córas stórála fuinnimh i gceallraí suite a áireamh sna haicmí forbartha ar gá tuarascáil ar mheasúnacht tionchair timpeallachta ina leith, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Planning and Development (Stationary Battery Energy Storage Systems) Bill 2024
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Pleanáil agus Forbairt (Córais Stórála Fuinnimh i gCeallraí Suite), 2024

debates.showAs: Improved Rail Passenger Rights with Compensation for Delays and Cancellations Bill 2024: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to require the National Transport Authority (NTA) to produce a report, to be delivered to the Minister of the Government with responsibility for a Department of State covering rail transport on the way in which the State may improve and strengthen rail passenger rights above and beyond the minimum requirements set down in EU secondary law, including Regulation 2021/782, with particular regard to delayed and cancelled railway services, including the modalities of rail passengers rights on the access to compensation for delays and cancellations; to require the NTA to periodically produce a report to be delivered to the Minister of the Government with responsibility for a Department of State covering rail transport on the implementation of the EU secondary law and national law on rail passenger rights; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht dá cheangal ar an Údarás Náisiúnta Iompair (ÚNI) tuarascáil a chur ar fáil, a bheidh le seachadadh ar an Aire den Rialtas atá freagrach as Roinn Stáit a bhfuil iompar d’iarnród faoina scáth, maidir leis an tslí ar a bhféadfaidh an Stát cearta do phaisinéirí iarnróid a fheabhsú agus a neartú sa bhreis ar na ceanglais íosta atá leagtha síos i ndlí tánaisteach AE, lena n-áirítear Rialachán 2021/782, le haird ar leith ar sheirbhísí iarnróid moillithe agus cealaithe, lena n-áirítear na módúlachtaí a bhaineann le cearta do phaisinéirí iarnróid i ndáil le rochtain ar chúiteamh i moilleanna agus i gcealuithe; dá cheangal ar ÚNI tuarascáil a chur ar fáil go tréimhsiúil, a bheidh le seachadadh ar an Aire den Rialtas atá freagrach as Roinn Stáit a bhfuil iompar d’iarnród faoina scáth, maidir le dlí tánaisteach AE agus an dlí náisiúnta a bhaineann le cearta do phaisinéirí iarnróid a chur i ngníomh; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Improved Rail Passenger Rights with Compensation for Delays and Cancellations Bill 2024
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chearta Feabhsaithe do Phaisinéirí Iarnróid le Cúiteamh i Moilleanna agus i gCealuithe, 2024

debates.showAs: Misuse of Drugs (Amendment) (Control of Nitrous Oxide) Bill 2023: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Misuse of Drugs Act 1977 and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Mí-Úsáid Drugaí, 1977 agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Misuse of Drugs (Amendment) (Control of Nitrous Oxide) Bill 2023
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Mí-Úsáid Drugaí (Leasú) (Ocsaíd Nítriúil a Rialú), 2023

debates.showAs: Non-Fatal Offences against the Person (Amendment) (Spiking) Bill 2023: Committee Stage (Resumed) and Remaining Stages
Non-Fatal Offences against the Person (Amendment) (Spiking) Bill 2023: Committee Stage
Non-Fatal Offences against the Person (Amendment) (Spiking) Bill 2023: Second Stage
Non-Fatal Offences against the Person (Amendment) (Spiking) Bill 2023: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the specific offence of spiking characterised by the administration, injection, or causation of the taking orally of a substance, knowing that the person to whom the substance is administered, injected, or caused to be taken does not consent, or being reckless as to whether the person consents, and where the perpetrator intends to overpower or sedate the person, to engage in a sexual act, cause harm, make a gain or cause a loss, or otherwise commit an offence.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir leis an gcion sonrach arb éard é spíceáil arb é a príomhthréith substaint a thabhairt nó a instealladh, nó glacadh substainte de bhéal a chur faoi deara, i gcás gurb eol nach bhfuil an duine dá dtugtar an tsubstaint, ina n-instealltar an tsubstaint nó a gcuirtear faoi deara é nó í do ghlacadh na substainte de bhéal ag toiliú, nó go bhfuiltear meargánta i dtaobh an bhfuil an duine ag toiliú, agus go mbeartaíonn déantóir an chiona an duine a smachtú nó a thámhú, chun dul i mbun gníomh gnéasach, díobháil a dhéanamh, gnóchan a dhéanamh nó caillteanas a thabhairt, nó cion a dhéanamh ar shlí eile.
bill.shortTitleEn: Non-Fatal Offences against the Person (Amendment) (Spiking) Bill 2023
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chionta Neamh-Mharfacha in aghaidh an Duine (Leasú) (Spíceáil), 2023

debates.showAs: Horticultural Peat (Temporary Measures) Bill 2021: Second Stage
Horticultural Peat (Temporary Measures) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Planning and Development Acts 2000 to 2021 and the Environmental Protection Agency Acts 1992 to 2011 to make exceptional provision for peat extraction for the purpose of horticulture for a temporary period in the public interest in order to mitigate the adverse consequences resulting, or likely to result from an interruption to supply and to provide for a just transition.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú na nAchtanna um Pleanáil agus Forbairt, 2000 go 2021 agus na nAchtanna fán nGníomhaireacht um Chaomhnú Comhshaoil, 1992 go 2011 chun socrú eisceachtúil a dhéanamh maidir le baint móna chun críche gairneoireachta ar feadh tréimhse shealadach ar mhaithe le leas an phobail d’fhonn maolú a dhéanamh ar na hiarmhairtí dochracha a bheidh, nó is dóigh a bheidh, mar thoradh ar bhriseadh ar sholáthar agus do dhéanamh socrú maidir le trasdul cóir.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Móin Ghairneoireachta (Bearta Sealadacha), 2021

debates.showAs: Criminal Procedure and Related Matters Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to make various amendments to aspects of criminal procedure and to make provision for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh leasuithe éagsúla ar ghnéithe den nós imeachta coiriúil agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Criminal Procedure and Related Matters Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Nós Imeachta Coiriúil agus Nithe Gaolmhara, 2021

debates.showAs: State Airports (Shannon Group) (Amendment) Bill 2020: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the State Airports (Shannon Group) Act 2014 and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Aerfoirt Stáit (Grúpa na Sionainne), 2014 agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Aerfoirt Stáit (Grúpa na Sionainne) (Leasú), 2020

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for an offence of driving with an unrestrained dog on board certain mechanically propelled vehicles; for that purpose to amend the Road Traffic Act 1961 and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le cion arb éard é feithiclí inneallghluaiste áirithe a thiomáint agus madra neamhshrianta ar bord; chun na críche sin do leasú an Achta um Thrácht ar Bhóithre, 1961 agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Thrácht ar Bhóithre (Leasú), 2019

debates.showAs: Civil Liability (Capping of General Damages) Bill 2019: Second Stage
Civil Liability (Capping of General Damages) Bill 2019: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the imposition of a cap on the level of awards which may be made in respect of a claim for general damages arising from personal injury; to provide for the confirmation by each House of the Oireachtas of draft regulations; to provide for a review of this Act; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le huasteorainn a fhorchur ar leibhéal na ndámhachtainí a dhéanfar i leith éileamh ar dhamáistí ginearálta a eascróidh as díobháil phearsanta; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le gach Teach den Oireachtas do dhaingniú dréacht-rialachán; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le hathbhreithniú ar an Acht seo; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Civil Liability (Capping of General Damages) Bill 2019
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Dhliteanas Sibhialta (Damáistí Ginearálta a Uasteorannú), 2019

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Local Government Act 1991 to ensure that the county status of a community shall not be altered without the explicit consent of the majority of its electorate.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta Rialtais Áitiúil, 1991 chun a chinntiú nach n-athrófar stádas contae pobail gan toiliú follasach thromlach a thoghlachta.
